R

RadiusOfGyration - Class in plugins
This can be used to calculate the radius of gyration (RoG) for the polygon features within a raster image.
RadiusOfGyration() - Constructor for class plugins.RadiusOfGyration
 
Reclass - Class in plugins
This tool creates a new raster in which the value of each grid cell is determined by an input raster and a collection of user-defined classes.
Reclass() - Constructor for class plugins.Reclass
 
ReclassEqualInterval - Class in plugins
This tool reclassifies the values in an input raster file based on an equal-interval scheme, where the user must specify the reclass interval value, the starting value, and optionally, the ending value.
ReclassEqualInterval() - Constructor for class plugins.ReclassEqualInterval
 
ReclassFromFile - Class in plugins
This tool creates a new raster image in which the value of each grid cell is determined by the values in an input raster image and a reclass file.
ReclassFromFile() - Constructor for class plugins.ReclassFromFile
 
RelatedCircumscribingCircle - Class in plugins
This tool can be used on either raster or vector files to calculate the related circumscribing circle (a circle which passes through all vertex features of a polygon).
RelatedCircumscribingCircle() - Constructor for class plugins.RelatedCircumscribingCircle
